name: ALL.ART
description: ALL.ART Protocol brings better NFT standards, proper ownership rights management, and improved liquidity for non-fungible tokens. By creating both infrastructural layers and products on top of it, we aim to empower creators, users, collectors, and investors to generate, utilize and trade new generations of NFTs. We are now at the dawn of a new eraâ€”the era of metaverses. The driving force behind it will not be virtual and augmented realities, but the transformation of ownership in these virtual worlds. We will finally own our data, assets, items, and estates.
